snippet: As the children of the collector C. C. Wang dispute their legacy, works have gone missing, dismaying art experts.
abstract: Dozens, perhaps hundreds, of artworks have disappeared from the estate of collector C C Wang during prolonged family dispute over inheritance; damage to Wang's collection, valued at more than $60 million, has dismayed Chinese-art experts who regard it as one of the finest of its kind.
lead_paragraph: As the children of the collector C. C. Wang dispute their legacy, works have gone missing, dismaying art experts.

headline.seo: Charges of Looting as Heirs Dispute C. C. Wang Collection
headline.main: A Family Battles Over a Disappearing Trove of Chinese Paintings
headline.print_headline: A Family Battles Over a Disappearing Trove of Chinese Paintings
